'''Dream Forms''' are exploration puzzles found in [[Golden Apple Archipelago/2.8|Golden Apple Archipelago]] during [[Summertime Odyssey]]. They appear as illusions of certain [[Wildlife]] and will move to a new location when approached by the player. Following a Dream Form to its destination will progress a puzzle or reward a [[chest]].

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/12?shown_types=368 Teyvat Interactive Map] for locations.
